recipes.title: Peanut Butter Sandwich
recipes.body: Put some peanut butter between some bread!

recipes.title: Scrambled Eggs
recipes.body: Lightly beat the eggs in a medium bowl. Cook in a nonstick pan for 10 minutes over low heat.

recipes.title: Scrambled Egg Sandwich
recipes.body: Scramble the eggs as noted earlier, then put them between some bread!
